page.title: 05Children's Games in Ryhope
page.content: When we asked people about their favourite{games}we found that there were a lot of games which people liked. We decided to write a small amount about the two most popular games:{Marbles and British Bulldog.} In the game of marbles 2 people play against each other. The object of the game is to win the opponent's marble. If the opponent's marble is ordinary you only have to hit it once. If, however, their marble is much better than yours then you would have to hit it several times to win the game. A popular game with the boys is {British Bulldog.}A number of people are needed. The object of the game is to get from one end of the court to the other. One person will try to stop you. If you are caught then you will help him to catch the others. The last person caught is the winner.
